keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save the NHS from Tory cuts and strongly backing Northampton General Hospital to upgrade its facilities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle the cost of living crisis for working families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will help families have more money in their pockets by freezing energy bills, improving child care and increasing the minimum wage.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight for more support for older people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will fight for more support for people with long term health care needs - like dementia, Parkinson's or strokes - and for their carers.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Win a better deal for young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will crack down on bad employers who use unfair zero hours contracts. Will work to get more support for education and a jobs guarantee scheme for young unemployed people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improve the state of our town
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lots of people complain about the town centre, the state of the roads, cleaning, lighting and shops. Will work for better infrastructure and environment.

issues.economy: Tackle the cost of living crisis for working families
issues.education: Win a better deal for young people
issues.environment: Improve the state of our town
